name: Natural - Beyond Nature -
description: Natural - Beyond Nature - is a Mystery, Drama, Supernatural Visual Novel. Follow the story of Olea in a chance encounter with two residents of a quiet island, Flori and Llima. Can Olea save them from their cruel yet inevitable fate?
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: XP 處理器: 1Ghz 記憶體: 2 GB 記憶體 儲存空間: 75.5 MB 可用空間
